chapter.title: Application for Future Climates
chapter.para: Presented in this section will be the steps necessary to use modelling systems for prediction of design floods in future climate regimes. Included in the discussion will be the need to change the catchment response parameters due to changes in geomorphology, vegetation, etc as well as the precipitation characteristics. Also discussed will be the current state of knowledge with respect to this problem and the resultant recommendations; in other words what should be done in the interim while further research is undertaken.
Real content needs to be inserted here.
